newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil's Boa Vista launches note program.
newsitem.headline: Brazil's Boa Vista launches note program.

text.p: Brazil's Banco Boa Vista is launching a $100 million 180-day trade note program through Bank of America, the bank said in a statement.
Due to high demand, Boa Vista upped its first tranche to $80 million from $50 million, it said. The remaining $20 million will be placed throughout the rest of the year.
The money will be used to finance trade operations for Boa Vista clients with gross revenues of betweem $5 million and $50 million, the statement said.
